item.title: How to add hidden mod / admin
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Try playerRights 5 or 10 in the character file. (I don’t own a PI source, so i wouldn’t know if it comes with Hidden Admin.) If not, just create a new playerRights in your source by copying everything admins can do and saying the playerRights is == to 5 (or 10) for them. They won’t have a crown because the clients are coded to have crowns for playerRights 1, 2, and 3.

Read full topic
